unnormalised: Arre yaar, Adv. Sharma mhonnta ki Sec. 138 Negotiable Instruments Act-acho lhan dhandeak dukhkhi aahe, khas korun soglle cheque bounce cases-acho! Khas korun tankam atam UPI vaprunk favo, barem?
normalised: Arre yaar, vakil Sharma mhanta ki Negotiable Instruments Act-acho Section ekso tees atth, lhan dhandhekarank dukhi dita, khas korun hea cheque bounce-chea cases-am! Zaite asa te U-P-I vaprun gheunk zata ata, barem asa mhuntalo?
text: Arre yaar, Adv. Sharma mhonnta ki Sec. 138 Negotiable Instruments Act-acho lhan dhandeak dukhkhi aahe, khas korun soglle cheque bounce cases-acho! Khas korun tankam atam UPI vaprunk favo, barem?
